com.rti.dds.infrastructure.EntityNameQosPolicy

EntityNameQosPolicy Class Reference
[ENTITY_NAME]

Policy used to name an entity. More...

Inheritance diagram for EntityNameQosPolicy:

Public Attributes

String name
 The actual name string.

Detailed Description

Policy used to name an entity.

Entity:
com.rti.dds.domain.DomainParticipant
Properties:
RxO = NO;
Changeable = UNTIL ENABLE

Usage

The purpose of this QoS is to allow the user to attach naming information to the created com.rti.dds.infrastructure.Entity objects.

It can only be 255 characters long in length.

It must be a NULL-terminated string allocated with DDS_String_alloc or DDS_String_dup.

If the user provides a non NULL pointer when getting the QoS, then it should point to valid memory that can be written to, to avoid ungraceful failures.

Member Data Documentation

String name
 

The actual name string.

[default] "PARTICIPANT" if the com.rti.dds.infrastructure.Entity is com.rti.dds.domain.DomainParticipant

[range] Null terminated string with length not exceeding 255. Can be NULL.
